title: ni aruLpuriya vENDum
sahitya:
nee aruL puriya vEnDum enadannaiyE! neelaayadaakshi!

nee aruL puriya vEnDum enadannaiyE!

(nee)



anupallavi



kaayum vevvinai nOyum ellaiyil

kavalaiyum niRainda avala piRappaRa

(nee)



caraNam 1



seelamilan aRam seydilan enRuLam

sinandu karuvizhi sivanduDal piLandu

kaalan uyir kavar vELaiyil unadu

kamala padam maRavaada varamadai

(nee)



caraNam 2



muLai suzhala aiyaRivu sidaRavum

mOha azhal vaLarndaagamadai uyir

taaLa vagaiyiladaaga uyiruDan

dahippadai kaDaikkaN mazhaittuLi taNikka

(nee)



caraNam 3



taraiyil sakala maadaraiyum enaiyeenRa

taayena madittu tozhavum tisai tisai

tiriyum mana mada kariyai aDakki un

tiruvaDi taRiyil piNikkavum siRidu

(nee)
